context.p: Snagit is a product of TechSmith Software Company. A user can add comments on the captured screenshot using arrows, shapes, etc. It has built-in advanced image edition options and screen recording facility.

ul.li: It has a preview window which shows the zoomed image of the area on which the cursor is hovering,
Images are editable in terms of size, special effects, etc.
A quick toolbar speeds-up the screen capture process.
Snagit supports Windows and Mac Operating Systems.
Snagit is available in various languages like English, Japanese, Korean and German.
It is also used to record a video of the screen and easily share it across the web or email.
It takes a full-page, scrolling screenshot and captures vertical & horizontal scrolls.
